resources.string: Want to see our pick of the top post on TheCampusFeed per day? Be sure to follow us on Twitter at @The_Campus_Feed!
Want to check out posts while you\'re on your computer? Be sure to check out www.TheCampusFeed.com!

Are you sure you wish to flag this post as inappropriate? Posts with a certain amount of flags per views are automatically removed. Do your part for TheCampusFeed community and flag any post that:

 • Is offensive, bad-natured, or threatening
 • Targets a specific person negatively to the point of bullying
 • Has a phone number
 
Users that have more than one post taken down get banned from posting on the app again.

TheCampusFeed is an anonymous message board. No logins, no accounts. Anyone can view any college\'s feed, as well as the All Colleges feed which is a mixture of all colleges\' posts put together.\n\nIf you make a post that gets a certain amount of flags, it will be automatically removed. If you have multiple posts removed, you will be banned from posting to the app. Think before you post! To view the rules, click the Flag icon for any post near you.

Want to post and comment on your University's feed this Summer as if you're actually there, but are instead visiting home? What about this Winter Break?

For every post you make to your University, 15 hours get added to your Time Crunch. Once you activate Time Crunch, your current location at your University is saved in the app for that long! You can get extra hours added by unlocking Achievements.

NOTE: Once you use your Time Crunch, there's no stopping it!
There is a new required app update.
